properties.title: Pumptrack Espace St-Marc
properties.abstract: The wide asphalt pump track in Le Châble was specially designed for beginners and is also well suited for children with a running bike. It is complemented by a skate park.
properties.description:
A wide track, flat waves, wide curves: the pump track in Le Châble is simple and particularly suitable for the little ones who can learn to balance with their running bikes or small bicycles in a playful manner.  

Thanks to the asphalt surface, the pump track can be used with a wide range of sports equipment: mountain bikes, BMXs, rollerblades, skateboards or even running bikes. 

The pump track is located in Le Châble in front of the Espace St-Marc, just a few minutes' walk from the train station and the bottom station of the cable car to Verbier. Right next to the pump track is a concrete skate park with a bowl and a street area.


Surface: asphalt
Area: 390m2
